n_metil_glucamine.name: N-Metil Glucamine
n_metil_glucamine.warning: Maximum 20 ml per day. Larger doses require specialist evaluation.

sodium_stibogluconate.name: Sodium stibogluconate
sodium_stibogluconate.warning: Maximum 6 ml per day. Larger doses require specialist evaluation.

pentamidine_isethionate.name: Pentamidine isethionate
pentamidine_isethionate.warning: Maximum 5 ml per day. Larger doses require specialist evaluation
preparation: Reconstitute each ampoule with 5 mL of water for injections.
Take blood glucose and blood pressure before administration.
Concomitantly, administer IV 100 to 200 mL of 5% DAD for 30 min.
Observe the patient for 1 hour controlling vital signs and glucometry.
Cite in 48 hours for the next dose.

miltefosine.name: Miltefosine
miltefosine.warning_under_10_kg: Do not deliver to patients with weight less than 10kg
miltefosine.warning_under_150_mg: Do not exceed 150 mg per day
miltefosine.note: Dosage divided into 2 to 3 daily doses
